code: export function obtenerDiferenciaYear(year){return new Date().getFullYear()-year;}export function calcularMarca(marca){var incremento;switch(marca){case"1":incremento=1.30;break;case"2":incremento=1.15;break;case"3":incremento=1.05;break;default:break;}return incremento;}export function calcularPlan(plan){return plan==="1"?1.20:1.50;}export function formatearDinero(cantidad){return cantidad.toLocaleString('en-US',{style:'currency',currency:'USD'});}
